subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2090 is on the way
description_text:
Dear Simsonn support team,

You have sent me the wrong pedal set. I ordered the Simsonn Plus X with
haptic reactor and baseplate, but have received what I believe are the pro
pedals?
I have attached pictures of what I received to this email.

As you can see, these are not the Plus X pedals as advertised on your
website. The black control box is different and has a green grounding wire
and no ports for the haptic reactors. Also, the pedals look different (no
holes for adjusting pedal plate).

I would very much like to receive the correct Plus X pedals :) .

Hope to hear from you soon!

Best regards,
Kostiantyn

[image: control.jpg]
[image: brake.jpg]
[image: box.jpg]

conversations.body_text: Hi Mkv2510kostya,  We will check it for you as soon as we return to work tomorrow and discuss a solution with you. We sincerely apologize, as this may have been caused by a packing error.

Hi,
Thank you for your swift response!

That is great. I will check back tomorrow :) .

On Tue, 29 Jul 2025 at 16:57, service@simsonn.com

Hi Mkv2510kostya,    We apologize for the inconvenience. To avoid additional taxes, our colleagues sent you the old Plus pedals from our warehouse in Germany and sent you the upgrade kit from China. Here is your tracking link.  https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=YT2520500705168983

Hi again,

Thank you for your response.
Can you please clarify what exactly is included in the upgrade kit? (Maybe
a link to the product on your website)
I don't fully understand how this upgrade works. Is it only elastomer
update, or does it allow me to upgrade fully to Plus X pedals with the new
control box, 3.5mm plates, adjustable pedal faces and everything?

Thanks,

Best regards,
Kostiantyn

On Wed, 30 Jul 2025 at 05:45, service@simsonn.com
Hi Mkv2510kostya,    Yes, including all elastomers and hydraulic dampers, as well as the latest control box. However, the pedal face is not included. If you need it later, we can send it to you!

Hello Simsonn Customer Service,

I have just received the package containing the upgrade kit and haptic
motors.
Unfortunately the new control box was not included in the package, and so I
am not able to use the haptic motors right now.

Also, one of the two-way hydraulic dampeners is faulty, as it moves freely
without dampening in some areas, unlike the other two-way dampener.

Could you please send the new control box as promised, and a working
two-way dampener?


Best regards,
Kostiantyn

On Thu, 31 Jul 2025 at 09:55, service@simsonn.com
Hi Mkv2510kostya,    This is the logistics link for your control box.   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2521100703095913      Also, please provide a video showing the broken hydraulic rod. Thank you.

Hi again,

Thank you sending over the tracking link!

I have attached the video showing that the rod does not dampen the movement
of the first 1cm from the extended position.

Also, I was looking for the manual for the Plus X pedals, on the website,
where I found these links:

https://download.simsonn.com/manual
https://download.simsonn.com/V4calibration
https://download.simsonn.com/newversion
https://download.simsonn.com/recoveryfile

Unfortunately, all of them result in error 404 in my browser, preventing me
from accessing the manual and tutorial videos, as well as drivers and
recovery files. Is it possible for you to provide a working link to this
content, or send me the manual in pdf format digitally? Thanks.

Best regards,
Kostiantyn

ons. 6. aug. 2025, 12.49 skrev service@simsonn.com 
Attachment(s) that exceed the 20 MB limit have been dropped. Please reach out to the sender.
This is the manual for Plus X.
The video you provided is too large, and we were unable to receive it. Please resend it. Thank you.

Thank you for sending over the manual.
I have cropped the video to reduce the size to 19 MB. If this is still too
large please let me know the maximum size you can receive.

Thanks,
Kostiantyn

tors. 7. aug. 2025, 06.02 skrev service@simsonn.com

Hello again,

Can confirm that I have received the control box!

Do you have any updates on the faulty dampener? In case anything got lost I
have attached the video of the faulty damper to this e-mail as well :) .
Please let me know if and when you will send a replacement, so I can get
started on upgrading the pedals.

I am excited to hear back from you!

Best regards,
Kostiantyn

Hi Mkv2510kostya,     We are unable to open the video you sent. Please upload the video to Google Drive, send us the link, and set the permissions to “Anyone with the link can view.”

Hello,
I uploaded the video to google drive. This is the sharing link:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/15yYZV5CnnTFm4mc2VOlZWPdYW3MHmBPa/view?usp=sharing

Please let me know if this works.

Best regards,
Kostiantyn


On Tue, 12 Aug 2025 at 07:24, service@simsonn.com

Hi Mkv2510kostya,  May I ask if this hydraulic rod has already been installed on the pedal for testing, or have you only tested it by pressing it manually? The correct installation method is to position the cylinder body at the top with the rod pointing downward. This ensures that any excess air can be effectively expelled after multiple movements. It is also normal for such hydraulic rods to have a certain amount of free travel by design. We recommend installing the hydraulic rod on the pedal for testing to ensure accurate results.

Hi Mkv2510kostya,  After installing it on the clutch, press the pedal back and forth 5–10 times to automatically expel the air, making the operation smoother. Additionally, we recommend using the red spring on the clutch for greater return force.
